name: Dishpan Cookies
author: Donna Stamp
instructions: Sift together flour, baking soda and salt. Combine sugars, vegetable oil and eggs, one at a time and vanilla in a very large bowl. (Dish- pan) Mix well. Add remaining ingredients and mix until thoroughly blended. Drop by teaspoonful onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 325Â° for 8 to 10 minutes, or until light brown.
